channel.title: Compiler not working..... Help?
channel.description:
Well first off some info to help you figure out the problem: Computer-Dell laditude runnign windows xp, JDK version- 1.6.0_25 Code im using @echo off echo Horridpkz compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java.exe" server pause
My error: javac: file not found: *.java usage:java <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server caused by: java.lang.classnotfoundexception: server at java.net.URLclassloader$1.run<urlclassloader.java:202>
not im not gonna type all but if something u need is in there ill will finish it I have a good feeling the code is wrong but if someone can redo it and teach me how to fix it because other compilers arent working for me

Yes but I dont know how to on other ones, you make it sound simple. And you couldnt do it, I couldnt. Idk Lol. I just cant do it for that type. if u used my code in a 562 client, guaranteed itl work

item.title: Compiler not working..... Help?
item.dc:creator: @Spyguy439 Spyguy439
item.description:
@Spyguy439 wrote:

[quote=“Gazascape, post:4, topic:397158”]I know its a 525 but try this anyway

[quote]@echo off
title rs2hd compiler
echo Preparing…
mkdir bin
cd src
copy log4j.xml …
cd …
move log4j.xml bin/
echo Compiling core…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
pause[/quote][/quote]
Now I come up with something little same ill give pic but the insert pic button wont work (I dont know how to work) XD sad

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler not working..... Help?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

pk2play:

Could you please post you error?

He doesn’t have errors he’s looking to correct his code because he thinks his is wrong. What is the revision? I’m mostly familiar with the 317. If it’s a 317, the code could look like this

@echo off color 0a title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo You have sucsessfully compiled pause exit

There’s a couple codes for it but this is one of them.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler not working..... Help?
item.dc:creator: @Spyguy439 Spyguy439
item.description:
@Spyguy439 wrote:

Well first off some info to help you figure out the problem: Computer-Dell laditude runnign windows xp, JDK version- 1.6.0_25
Code im using
@echo off
echo Horridpkz compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe” *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\java.exe” server
pause

My error:
javac: file not found: *.java
usage:java
use -help for a list of possible options
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
caused by: java.lang.classnotfoundexception: server
at java.net.URLclassloader$1.runurlclassloader.java:202

not im not gonna type all but if something u need is in there ill will finish it
